title: Permissions Numeric Mode
content:
Numeric permissions

Numeric mode (octal) encodes r=4, w=2, x=1 per class (user/group/other).

  • 755 = rwxr-xr-x
  • 644 = rw-r--r--
  • 600 = rw-------
chmod 755 hello.sh
chmod 644 notes.txt
chmod 600 secret.txt
ls -l hello.sh notes.txt secret.txt

Practice

Create a file, set it to 640, and verify the bits via ls -l.

touch report.txt
chmod 640 report.txt
ls -l report.txt
